import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import FetchSingleMovieDetails from '../../hooks/detailMovie' const WatchMovie=()=>{ const {movieId} = useParams(); const { data:movie, isLoading,isError:errorMessage } = FetchSingleMovieDetails(movieId) return (
{movie && movie.title}
